attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. As soon as I downloaded it, my phone overheated. After I put it in the bottom of the Pacific Ocean to cool it off, I was finally able to turn my phone back on... and as soon as it finally turned back on, Cheeto Dust himself jumped through the screen and punched me in the face and screamed homophobic comments at me. I immediately deleted the app to get rid of the virus, but unfortunately Dumpster Boy is still president so the virus is still alive and well. Would NEVER recommend this app to anyone I know.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER

attributes.review: This app is gross and disgusting! i met this app through a mural friends a few years back in 2016. This app and I started texting and face-timing every night. We hit it off super quick and became exclusive very soon after we met. After a couple months of being intimate, i was in the doctors office doing some standard blood work and test. To my surprise, the doctor tells me i have diagnosed with AIDS! And see, this apps is the only one i have been with so i know it’s his fault! I’m disgusted, ashamed, and disappointed of this app! IT NEEDS TO BE TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP GAVE ME AIDS!!

attributes.review: this app is terrible. i wanted to know what my rapi- sorry. republican president was up to. however, i was disgusted to find out there is an disgusting man who has done and continues to do horrible things to people, especially the people of color. and THEN i was APPALLED to find out that he is the one people allowed to be in charge of this country. so disappointing and gross. he’s extremely unfit. hopefully americans will wake up and vote him OUT of office come November. Deleting this app and sending a complaint to corporate. Cannot believe I wasted my space and time.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: This app will take away your house and your family!! I was minding my own business with my pet dinosaur and then all of a sudden, my house and my family glitched away! It was like the app had a virus and it gave it my house and my family! I am now homeless, but at least I have my pet dinosaur. Would you look at that, this stupid app also took my dinosaur 😭!! This is the worst app ever!!!! It will take away all you have. If you don’t want to end up like me, don’t download this app. Also this app is useless, so hopefully they take it down.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.review: hi there just got to the point where you are so confused and confused 🤷‍♀️ is that the same people are you gonna 🤣 he killed my daughter by this scary face on my screen and it gave my husband a stroke 🥰🥰(tysm for getting rid of him(dave if you’re reading this i’m joking haha 😆)) Anyways i got off track this app has made my cousin f my grandpa and lots of more weird things 💋Watch kpop it’s actually nice pls and ty🥰 anyways this app has made my dinosaur eat a volcano so i suggest fixing it before i hsjandbdb you 🤬!! Watch sofia the first to get educated you trumpets tysm for reading
attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: So when i got this app a meteor landed right beside my house and i went to go see it but when I got got there guess who I saw.. I saw E.T and he was all like this place trash then I offered him a slice of the pizza I bought but he denied the offer and with his glowing finger thing he went flying, the all of a sudden my dog was floating inside the house and I was like “why is you flying” and he answered and said “ you know just trying out the new food and then I realized he ate my helium that I was gonna have for breakfast and that all happened when I got this app😤
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is an absolute disappointment. The way it was described in the App Store gave me such high hopes. It claimed that if I downloaded this app it would “make America great”. Well CLEARLY this was fake news. Not sooner did I get the app did America decide to deport international students if their college switched to online schooling and covid cases continued to spike and the rather orange man with a toupee did nothing about it?! Even though he’s the face of the app that told me it would make America great? I’m very dissatisfied in the product I was provided. I wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone.
attributes.title: Heck to the nah

attributes.review: I would give 0 stars if I could! I had to get a new phone because of this app. I was just ok my couch watching dance moms and my phone started glitching. So I just thought i needed to shut it off. But then my whole phone just shut off! Then I heard a nock at my door and all I heard was FBI OPEN you are being arrested for trying to save Barron. So I was like no! Then they went on my phone and saw I had the trump app and they were like oh sorry wrong person. RACIST MUCH. So end off story my phone never turned back on and I am very disappointed!!
attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE MARKET

attributes.review: Whenever I first opened the app the first thing I saw was a Cheeto puff hanging from trumps ball sack... it was traumatizing for my eyes 👁👄👁 never again. After I closed the app it must have set a virus on my phone because my home and lock screen was a picture of his junk🙈 I powered off my phone and it wouldn’t let me. Siri kept saying the orange spray tan somehow got into my phone. The power of the orange almost broke my phone if it wasn’t for my anti trump app I downloaded right after once I downloaded that all my problems went away😌💅
attributes.title: ✨RUINED✨MY WHOLE PHONE

attributes.review: I opened this app and saw someone tying up my bestie the Cheeto leopard. The guy tying him up said I’m next then he broke my phone after coming out of it. He then took me and said I was cute?! Not surprised I’m cute but uh I prefer Biden supporters not trump supporters. He also said I needed to loose weight! I was so disgusted. I called out for my grandma and she grabbed her chancala and made him pass out by my throwing at him. We put him in a pile of dog droppings! After we did that my grandma saw the app then fainted. All this was last week and she still hasn’t woken up, maybe she was very tired.
attributes.title: Ugh!!
